posts.title: The Future of Human-Computer Interaction
posts.description: Exploring how AI and machine learning are reshaping the way we interact with computers. From voice assistants to gesture recognition, we're entering a new era of intuitive interfaces that understand human intent better than ever before.

posts.title: Building Tools That Matter
posts.description: A reflection on what it means to create software that genuinely improves people's lives. Not every tool needs to be revolutionary, but every tool should solve a real problem with empathy and care.
